title: User display in top right corner
fix_description: Updated UNIVERSAL_USER_DISPLAY.js to check for 'userName' localStorage key (set by login.html). Script now properly displays logged-in user in top right corner on all pages including index.html#features.

fix_details.problem: login.html stores username as 'userName' but display script was checking for 'workspace_user_name', 'user_name', or 'username'
fix_details.solution: Added 'userName' as first check in localStorage retrieval chain
fix_details.result: User display now works after login - shows username in top right corner with green styling
